Title: Authentic FREY WILLE Magic Sphinx Turquoise 24K Enamel Diva Bangle LARGE NIB
Description: I am downsizing and selling all my personally collections! I have personally acquired this from Europe.Guaranteed 100% authentic FREY WILLE in the most beautiful enamel with 24K accents bangle from their famous "Magic Sphinx" collection in the most desirable "Turquoise" color.This is a wide DIVA bangle avant garde style with 2 yellow gold-plated mounting rims.The magical layers of turquoise blue color shades and 24K yellow gold application masterfully set in yellow gold-plated mounting. Even the 24K gold shades has shiny, matt and raised relief layers. You have to see it in person to see the magical beauty of it. I just cannot capture the lovely design and beautiful workmanship on a camera! The bangle width measures 1.5 inches (3.8 cm) wide. This is a Large (L): 2-5/8 inches (6.7 cm) wide interior diameter.The outside circumference is 9 inches (23 cm). The inside is 8.5 inches (21.5 cm). Please see the last gallery picture on how to measure your hand to determine if this bangle size is for you.Markings on the inside "FREY WILLE ® with its lion logo" and "Made in Austria" .It will include the FREY WILLE blue color bangle box as shown.Condition is brand new in box as shown and no defect at all. This is one of my favorite designs! I have been a collector of Frey Wille (Michaela Frey) brand jewelry since the year of 2000. I have known a lot about its history and collections/designs. I consider myself an expert in this particular brand in the U.S.A. I have also been a collector of antique (both fine and costume) jewelry for the last 30 years and fond of enamel jewelry. You can purchase with confidence! I do not accept return on this item due to delicate jewelry item. If you are buying this as gift and may need to return it, please notify me first before purchasing this item. Even if you buy from a Frey Wille store, they will not accept return nor exchange. I describe my item exactly what it is. I personally took the pictures and measurements myself. S'il vous plaît respecter vendeurs dans le U.S.A., merci!* * * * *Precious EnamelEnamel is a mixture of finely ground glass and mineral additives; that is melted down at approx. 800°C.In roughly 20 procedural steps, a base coat of four individual layers of enamel is applied onto metal foundation.Application of GoldGenuine 24 karat yellow gold powder is then applied by hand and fused into the enamel. * * * Non-smoking environment! * * *
